rules_text:
Choose one – 
• Destroy target creature with mana value 3 or less.
• Create a tapped 2/2 green Fungus creature token.
notes:
Power 3 or less? Power 2 or less? Choose one — or make a tapped 2/2 Fungus Elemental token? Scry?

December

They found the last industrialist who tried to get Foxtown a reliable water supply in his home with mushrooms sprouting from every hole in his face.
